summary: Wir laden herzlich zum ersten gemeinsamen Treffen des Vereins **Allegra March** ein!
title: Treffen der Allegra March

content:
Data Protection & Privacy We take the protection of your data and your privacy very seriously.
You always decide what personal information you want to share and how it should be used.
Registration and Contact When registering for an Atelier or an Info-Point event, you provide us with your name and a way to contact you, either via email and/or by phone/smartphone.
This information is used only for the participant list of the respective event and is not shared with third parties.
To stay in contact with the Atelier organizer and receive important information, you can join a WhatsApp chat (please see the WhatsApp Privacy Policy).
If you prefer to receive information by email, you can inform the Atelier organizer directly.
Photos & Public Relations To promote the work of our association and share impressions from the Ateliers on our website and social media platforms, photos may be taken during events.
üì∑ Taking photos during an event is only permitted to:
the Atelier organizers, or a member of the association
who is attending the event to support or take photos. üõë All other participants are not allowed to take photos.
This ensures that your privacy preferences (see next section) are respected.
Consent Form At the beginning of an Atelier, you will be asked to fill out a consent form, where you can indicate:
whether we may publish a photo in which you appear whether your face may be visible or only shown in photos
where, for example, you are seen from behind Detailed Policy üìÑ The detailed data protection policy‚Ä¶
summary:
Data Protection & Privacy We take the protection of your data and your privacy very seriously.
You always decide what personal information you want to share and how it should be used.
title: Data Protection & Privacy

content:
We say thank you!
We would like to thank all the dedicated volunteers of the Allegra March association, as well as everyone who leads Ateliers and organizes Info-Point events.
A special thanks goes to Komin for their support in launching our association, their committed assistance in our work, and their valuable role as a point of contact.
And last but not least, we thank all the participants of the Ateliers and Info-Point events. With you, we can bring integration and inclusion to life.
summary:
We say thank you!
We would like to thank all the dedicated volunteers of the Allegra March association, as well as everyone who leads Ateliers and organizes Info-Point events.
A special thanks goes to Komin for their support in launching our association, their committed assistance in our work, and their valuable role as a point of contact.
title: Gratitude

content:

content:
What we do In the Knitting Club, people of all skill levels come together to knit, share techniques, and enjoy being creative.
Whether you‚Äôre working on your own project or just learning, everyone is welcome. It‚Äôs a space for conversation, craftsmanship, and connection.
Practical Info üóì When: Every Thursday, 17:00‚Äì18:30 üìç Where: Allegra Community Center, Zurich üí∏ Participation: Free. Please bring your own yarn and needles. Some materials are available on site. Contact Verantwortlich: Monika Example
E-Mail: stricken@topli.ch Telefon: +41 79 888 77 66 WhatsApp: Gruppe beitreten I want to join Name E-Mail Telefon Warum m√∂chtest du teilnehmen? Absenden
summary: Knit together, share stories, and enjoy creativity in a cozy atmosphere.
title: Knitting Club

content:
What we do At the Game Club, people of all ages come together to enjoy board games ‚Äì from classics like Uno or chess to new card games.
It‚Äôs not about winning, but about having fun, sharing laughs, and spending quality time together. Feel free to bring your favorite games too!
Practical Info üóì When: Every Friday, 17:30‚Äì19:30 üìç Where: Allegra Community Center, Zurich üí∏ Participation: Free, games are provided Contact Verantwortlich: Laura Example
E-Mail: spiel@topli.ch Telefon: +41 79 456 78 90 WhatsApp: Gruppe beitreten I want to join Name E-Mail Telefon Warum m√∂chtest du teilnehmen? Absenden
summary: Play together, laugh, and meet new people in a friendly setting.
title: Game Club

content:
What we do The Hiking Club is for everyone who wants to spend time outdoors. We walk together on beautiful paths around Zurich, have conversations, and enjoy the fresh air.
The hikes are easy-going and open to all ‚Äì a perfect way to meet new people in a relaxed atmosphere.
Practical Info üóì When: Every second Sunday, 10:00‚Äì13:00 üìç Where: Meeting point announced in advance üí∏ Cost: Free, weather-appropriate clothing recommended Contact Verantwortlich: Thomas Example
E-Mail: wander@topli.ch Telefon: +41 79 987 65 43 WhatsApp: Gruppe beitreten I want to join Name E-Mail Telefon Warum m√∂chtest du teilnehmen? Absenden
summary: Discover nature together, enjoy movement, and meet new people.
title: Hiking Club

content:
What We Do In the Language Atelier, people with different native languages meet to practice German and exchange experiences. Beginners and advanced learners are all welcome!
We speak in small groups, play language games, and help each other to communicate more confidently.
Organization üóì When: Every Tuesday, 6:00‚Äì7:30 PM üìç Where: Allegra Community Center, Zurich üí∏ Participation: Free of charge Contact Verantwortlich: Anna Beispiel
E-Mail: sprach@topli.ch Telefon: +41 79 123 45 67 WhatsApp: Gruppe beitreten I want to join Name E-Mail Telefon Warum m√∂chtest du teilnehmen? Absenden
summary: Practice languages together, learn from each other, and grow interculturally.
title: Language Atelier

content:
What we do The Yoga Club offers gentle sessions for all levels ‚Äî beginners and experienced participants alike.
We focus on relaxation, breathwork, and simple movements that help us arrive in the present moment. It‚Äôs a space to recharge, calm your mind, and connect with others.
Practical Info üóì When: Every Wednesday, 19:00‚Äì20:00 üìç Where: Allegra Community Center, Zurich üí∏ Participation: Free, yoga mats provided. Comfortable clothing recommended. Contact Verantwortlich: Elena Example
E-Mail: yoga@topli.ch Telefon: +41 79 333 22 11 WhatsApp: Gruppe beitreten I want to join Name E-Mail Telefon Warum m√∂chtest du teilnehmen? Absenden
summary: Relax, breathe, and connect body and mind in a welcoming space.
title: Yoga Club

content:
The Photography Club is a space for people who enjoy taking photos, editing, and showcasing their work.
We organize photowalks, share editing tips, and prepare small exhibitions together.
Contact: Lisa Muster
Email: lisa@example.com
WhatsApp group: Join the chat
summary: For everyone who loves capturing meaningful moments.
title: Photography Club

content:
Who we are Allegra March is a non-profit association composed of volunteers from different countries and cultures. Our goal is to promote community and cultural exchange, thus facilitating integration and inclusion in Switzerland.
Our offer is aimed at all residents of the March district ‚Äì whether local or newly arrived.
Our concept ‚ÄúThis project thrives on the diverse participation of everyone.‚Äù
‚Äì Guiding principle of the association
In various Ateliers, interested individuals come together to spend their free time in meaningful ways.
üßµ An overview and registration for each Atelier can be found under Ateliers.
ü§ù If you would like to offer an Atelier yourself, we look forward to your message.
Creating together Every few months, all interested people gather in a plenum
to present what has been created in the Ateliers
and to introduce new ideas and initiatives.
üóì The various dates can be found in the Agenda.
Additional offerings üìå In cooperation with Komin, we offer information events
on various topics related to life in Switzerland.
Details can be found under Info-Point.
üñº To get a first impression of our activities,
take a look at our Gallery.
üì∞ Reports about our project and association can be found under News.
üì± You can also find us on all major social media platforms.
summary: Who we are Allegra March is a non-profit association composed of volunteers from different countries and cultures. Our goal is to promote community and cultural exchange, thus facilitating integration and inclusion in Switzerland.
title: About us
